tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V3.1.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: The Rite
programme.desc: A veteran priest (Anthony Hopkins) introduces a skeptical seminary student (Colin O'Donoghue) to the dark side of their faith at a Vatican school where clergymen become exorcists.(n)

programme.title: Down a Dark Hall
programme.desc: Five emotionally fragile teens are committed to Blackwood, a mysterious boarding school for gifted and disturbed girls.(n)

programme.title: Stigmata
programme.desc: An atheist's (Patricia Arquette) visions and manifestations of wounds like those of the crucified Christ prompt the Vatican to send an investigator (Gabriel Byrne).(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: A self-aware, artificial human (Ambyr Childers) becomes caught in the crossfire between a cop (Thomas Jane) and the creator (Bruce Willis) of an exclusive resort where paying customers play out their wildest fantasies.(n)

programme.title: The Quarry
programme.desc: After murdering a traveling preacher, a fugitive drifter assumes his identity and becomes the new cleric of a small-town church. While he wins over the congregation, the police chief starts to link the mysterious stranger to a crime investigation.(n)

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: A building manager (Paul Giamatti) rescues an enigmatic young woman (Bryce Dallas Howard) and learns that she is a "narf," a character from a bedtime story, who is trying to return to her world.(n)

programme.title: Beginners
programme.desc: Newfound love elicits a man's (Ewan McGregor) memories of his late father (Christopher Plummer), who came out of the closet at 75 to fully embrace his homosexuality.(n)

programme.title: The Return of the Living Dead
programme.desc: Punk rockers, a cremator (Don Calfa) and medical-supply workers (Clu Gulager, James Karen) have a problem with zombies in Kentucky.(n)

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Thirty years ago, Clifford McBride led a voyage into space, but the ship and crew were never heard from again. Now his son must embark on a daring mission to uncover the truth about his father and a mysterious power surge that threatens the universe.(n)

programme.title: Chasing Mavericks
programme.desc: Hearing that the mythic Mavericks surf break is real, a teenage surfer (Jonny Weston) asks a local legend (Gerard Butler) to teach him how to ride the wave and live to tell the tale.(n)

programme.title: Surrogates
programme.desc: FBI agents (Bruce Willis, Radha Mitchell) probe a murder case linked to the inventor of technology that allows people to live vicariously though robotic versions of themselves.(n)

programme.title: Showdown in Little Tokyo
programme.desc: A hulking police detective (Dolph Lundgren) and his Eurasian partner (Brandon Lee) take turns kicking around the Japanese yakuza.(n)

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: Young Bruce Lee is trying to make a name for himself while working as a martial arts instructor in 1964 San Francisco. When Lee meets Wong Jack Man, he challenges the kung fu master to a no-holds-barred fight that became the stuff of legend.(n)

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A master thief (Mark Wahlberg) and his crew plan to steal back a fortune in gold bullion after they lose it to a double-crossing gang member (Edward Norton).(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: A former Special Forces operative (Jason Statham) springs into action to save the kidnapped son of an anti-drug czar.(n)

programme.title: 12 Strong
programme.desc: In the wake of Sept. 11, Capt. Mitch Nelson leads a U.S. Special Forces team into Afghanistan to take down the Taliban and al-Qaida. Outgunned and outnumbered, Nelson and his forces face overwhelming odds in a fight against a ruthless enemy.(n)

programme.title: Mama
programme.desc: As a woman (Jessica Chastain) tries to reintroduce her lover's (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) traumatized nieces to a normal life, disturbing questions and occurrences suggest that a supernatural presence has followed the girls to her home.(n)

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: Desperate and lonely, a photo developer (Robin Williams) obsesses over members (Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan) of a family that patronizes his booth in a department store.(n)

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: An author (James Caan) recovers from an accident, nursed by a twisted fan (Kathy Bates) who insists he write a new book just for her.(n)

programme.title: Lost Boys: The Tribe
programme.desc: After moving to a new California town, a young woman (Autumn Reeser) learns that her new friends are a pack of vampires.(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
programme.desc: An American Indian helps a broke and homeless family (JoBeth Williams, Craig T. Nelson), once again prey to a poltergeist (Julian Beck).(n)

programme.title: The Man With One Red Shoe
programme.desc: A bicycling violinist (Tom Hanks) becomes a pawn of spy chiefs in their struggle for control of the CIA.(n)

programme.title: Impostor
programme.desc: In the year 2079 a federal agent (Vincent D'Onofrio) relentlessly pursues a weapons designer (Gary Sinise) suspected of being a deadly clone.(n)

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: A Jamaican boy dreams of flying to the moon.(n)

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: A scientist (Nicole Kidman) and an Army Special Forces colonel (George Clooney) travel the globe in pursuit of stolen nuclear weapons.(n)

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: During World War II's Battle of Okinawa, U.S. Army medic Desmond Doss (Andrew Garfield) braves bullets, grenades and snipers while single-handedly evacuating the wounded from behind enemy lines.(n)

programme.title: Runaway Train
programme.desc: Escaped convicts (Jon Voight, Eric Roberts) and a stowaway girl (Rebecca De Mornay) ride an unmanned diesel speeding out of control through Alaska.(n)

programme.title: Holy Rollers
programme.desc: A Jewish youth (Jesse Eisenberg) risks being ostracized from his religious community when he becomes a drug mule for his best friend's older brother.(n)

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: The vengeful spirit of a dead teenager returns 20 years later to terrorize four high-school students (Reese Mishler, Pfeifer Brown, Ryan Shoos) trapped in an auditorium.(n)

programme.title: Brothers by Blood
programme.desc: A man remains tormented by his sister's death, while his cousin grows more powerful in the hierarchy of the family crime business.(n)

programme.title: Confessions of a Dangerous Mind
programme.desc: Chuck Barris (Sam Rockwell) produces game shows for television and leads a double life as a CIA assassin.(n)

programme.title: The Mighty Quinn
programme.desc: Power figures want a Caribbean police chief (Denzel Washington) to find his friend Maubee (Robert Townsend), their scapegoat for a murder.(n)

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Enslaved by a loan shark (Bob Hoskins), a violent fighter (Jet Li) escapes and meets a blind man (Morgan Freeman) who teaches him humanity.(n)

programme.title: Lawnmower Man 2: Jobe's War
programme.desc: An evil corporation planning an inescapable global computer network hires a mentally impaired laborer (Matt Frewer) made into a genius by virtual reality.(n)

programme.title: Impostor
programme.desc: In the year 2079 a federal agent (Vincent D'Onofrio) relentlessly pursues a weapons designer (Gary Sinise) suspected of being a deadly clone.(n)

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: A hunted Philadelphia detective (Harrison Ford) moves in with an Amish widow (Kelly McGillis) and her murder-witness son.(n)

programme.title: Sharky's Machine
programme.desc: An Atlanta vice-squad detective (Burt Reynolds) loves a high-class call girl (Rachel Ward) linked to politics and a mob boss (Vittorio Gassman).(n)

programme.title: Rock of Ages
programme.desc: Songs by Def Leppard, Journey, Joan Jett, Bon Jovi and others underscore a rock 'n' roll romance between a small-town girl (Julianne Hough) and a city boy (Diego Boneta) who meet on the Sunset Strip while chasing their Hollywood dreams.(n)

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: Parental disapproval only makes two teenage lovers (Alex Pettyfer, Gabriella Wilde) more reckless as they pursue their intense affair.(n)

programme.title: Cap
programme.desc: A teen upsets his parents when he brings home an expensive hat.(n)

programme.title: Freejack
programme.desc: An auto racer (Emilio Estevez) crashes into dismal 2009, his body snatched by a bounty hunter (Mick Jagger) for use by a dying tycoon (Anthony Hopkins).(n)

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: In 1820, crewmen (Chris Hemsworth, Benjamin Walker) from the New England vessel Essex face a harrowing battle for survival after a whale of mammoth size and strength attacks with force, crippling their ship and leaving them adrift in the ocean.(n)

programme.title: Blades of Glory
programme.desc: Several years after being banned from men's singles competition, two rival skaters (Will Ferrell, Jon Heder) exploit a loophole that allows them to compete as a pair.(n)

programme.title: Jojo Rabbit
programme.desc: Jojo is a lonely German boy who discovers that his single mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their attic. Aided only by his imaginary friend -- Adolf Hitler -- Jojo must confront his blind nationalism as World War II continues to rage on.(n)

programme.title: Proof of Life
programme.desc: A woman (Meg Ryan) enlists a hostage negotiator (Russell Crowe) to lead mercenaries to rescue her kidnapped husband (David Morse) from South American guerrillas.(n)

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A rescue party (Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan) encounters supernatural forces aboard a prototype spaceship that vanished seven years earlier.(n)

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A séance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widow's (Elizabeth Reaser) youngest daughter (Lulu Wilson) in 1967 Los Angeles.(n)

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: Soldiers (The Rock, Karl Urban) use heavy firepower to battle mutants at a high-tech research facility on Mars.(n)

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes 2
programme.desc: Cannibalistic mutants attack a group of National Guardsmen (Michael McMillian, Jessica Stroup, Daniella Alonso) investigating a distress signal in the New Mexican desert.(n)

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: A scientist (Pierce Brosnan) uses a mentally impaired man (Jeff Fahey) to test virtual reality, the computer simulation of the real.(n)

programme.title: Evelyn X Evelyn
programme.desc: A couple mourn the loss of their child.(n)

programme.title: Deep Cover
programme.desc: An undercover officer (Larry Fishburne) hooks up with a lawyer (Jeff Goldblum) who deals drugs for a West Coast cartel run by a foreign diplomat.(n)

programme.title: The Presidio
programme.desc: An Army provost marshal (Sean Connery) clashes with a detective (Mark Harmon) over a murder at the San Francisco military base.(n)

programme.title: The Girl With All the Gifts
programme.desc: In the future, a strange fungus has changed nearly everyone into a thoughtless, flesh-eating monster. When a scientist and a teacher find a girl who seems to be immune to the fungus, they all begin a journey to save humanity.(n)

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorize his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.(n)

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: In the future a government agent (Christian Bale) and a band of rebels battle a regime that uses a drug to suppress people's emotions.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Half
programme.desc: A Maine professor's (Timothy Hutton) hidden bad side comes alive under his notorious but successful pen name.(n)

programme.title: Basic Instinct
programme.desc: An erotic writer (Sharon Stone) toys with a San Francisco detective (Michael Douglas) who thinks she might be an ice-pick killer.(n)

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: A scientist (Nicole Kidman) and an Army Special Forces colonel (George Clooney) travel the globe in pursuit of stolen nuclear weapons.(n)

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc: New York City cop John McClane (Bruce Willis) and his estranged son (Jai Courtney) must put aside their differences and work together to get a Russian whistleblower to safety and thwart a disastrous crime in Chernobyl.(n)

programme.title: Motherless Brooklyn
programme.desc: Lionel Essrog is a private detective who doesn't let Tourette's syndrome stand in the way of his job. Gifted with a few clues and an obsessive mind, Essrog must contend with thugs and corruption while investigating the murder of his only friend.(n)

programme.title: Ready or Not
programme.desc: Grace couldn't be happier after she marries the man of her dreams at his family's luxurious estate. There's just one catch -- she must now hide from midnight until dawn while her new in-laws hunt her down with guns, crossbows and other weapons.(n)

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie (Nicholas Hoult) and a living woman (Teresa Palmer) sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.(n)

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: A woman (Fernanda Andrade) recruits two young exorcists to help her determine whether her mother, who murdered three people, is mentally ill or possessed by demons.(n)

programme.title: Supernova
programme.desc: A medical spaceship answers an SOS from a mining project on a comet and finds a sole survivor with an alien artifact.(n)

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: Sean Anderson (Josh Hutcherson) and his new stepfather (Dwayne Johnson) find an island of secrets, strange life forms, and gold when they answer a coded distress signal.(n)

programme.title: Impostor
programme.desc: In the year 2079 a federal agent (Vincent D'Onofrio) relentlessly pursues a weapons designer (Gary Sinise) suspected of being a deadly clone.(n)

programme.title: A Perfect Murder
programme.desc: A commodities trader (Michael Douglas) takes action when his wife (Gwyneth Paltrow) has an affair with a bohemian painter (Viggo Mortensen).(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Hall's sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.(n)

programme.title: Idlewild
programme.desc: In a 1930s speakeasy, a piano player (André Benjamin) and his fellow performer (Antwan A. Patton) try to keep their establishment out of hoodlums' hands.(n)

programme.title: Confessions of a Dangerous Mind
programme.desc: Chuck Barris (Sam Rockwell) produces game shows for television and leads a double life as a CIA assassin.(n)

programme.title: Inheritance
programme.desc: A patriarch of a wealthy and powerful family suddenly passes away, leaving his wife and daughter with a shocking secret inheritance that threatens to unravel and destroy their lives.(n)

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A former hostage negotiator (Bruce Willis) must take action when three carjackers hold a wealthy man (Kevin Pollak) and his children at gunpoint.(n)

programme.title: Brothers by Blood
programme.desc: A man remains tormented by his sister's death, while his cousin grows more powerful in the hierarchy of the family crime business.(n)

programme.title: The Mighty Quinn
programme.desc: Power figures want a Caribbean police chief (Denzel Washington) to find his friend Maubee (Robert Townsend), their scapegoat for a murder.(n)

programme.title: Belly
programme.desc: Two young friends (Nas, DMX) involved in organized crime and drug dealing find that their priorities differ.(n)

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: During World War II's Battle of Okinawa, U.S. Army medic Desmond Doss (Andrew Garfield) braves bullets, grenades and snipers while single-handedly evacuating the wounded from behind enemy lines.(n)

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: Parental disapproval only makes two teenage lovers (Alex Pettyfer, Gabriella Wilde) more reckless as they pursue their intense affair.(n)

programme.title: Trance
programme.desc: A criminal (Vincent Cassel) hires a hypnotherapist (Rosario Dawson) to probe the mind of a brain-injured auctioneer (James McAvoy) to uncover the hiding place of a stolen painting.(n)

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: A hunted Philadelphia detective (Harrison Ford) moves in with an Amish widow (Kelly McGillis) and her murder-witness son.(n)

programme.title: The Fisherman
programme.desc: An aging fisherman returns from the sea with a talking fish. Animated.(n)

programme.title: How to Be a Player
programme.desc: A womanizer's (Bill Bellamy) sister (Natalie Desselle) and girlfriend (Lark Voorhies) study him for anthropology class, then try to reform him.(n)

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: An energetic schoolgirl (Molly Shannon) hopes to win a talent contest where a prize as a movie extra might lead to her first kiss.(n)

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two high-school nerds (Anthony Michael Hall, Ilan Mitchell-Smith) computer-generate a magic beauty (Kelly LeBrock) who shows them how to meet girls.(n)

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: A rookie policeman (Nick Cannon) works under cover at a prep school to investigate the mysterious death of a student.(n)

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Enslaved by a loan shark (Bob Hoskins), a violent fighter (Jet Li) escapes and meets a blind man (Morgan Freeman) who teaches him humanity.(n)

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: A scientist (Pierce Brosnan) uses a mentally impaired man (Jeff Fahey) to test virtual reality, the computer simulation of the real.(n)

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: Soldiers (The Rock, Karl Urban) use heavy firepower to battle mutants at a high-tech research facility on Mars.(n)

programme.title: The Betrayed
programme.desc: Kidnappers force a young mother (Melissa George) to recover money stolen by her shady husband (Christian Campbell).(n)

programme.title: The 15:17 to Paris
programme.desc: On Aug. 21, 2015, American tourists Anthony Sadler, Alek Skarlatos and Spencer Stone thwart a terrorist attack on a train heading to Paris. Their heroic and courageous actions help to save the lives of more than 500 passengers on board.(n)

programme.title: Rock of Ages
programme.desc: Songs by Def Leppard, Journey, Joan Jett, Bon Jovi and others underscore a rock 'n' roll romance between a small-town girl (Julianne Hough) and a city boy (Diego Boneta) who meet on the Sunset Strip while chasing their Hollywood dreams.(n)

programme.desc: Several years after being banned from men's singles competition, two rival skaters (Will Ferrell, Jon Heder) exploit a loophole that allows them to compete as a pair.(n)

programme.desc: An evil corporation planning an inescapable global computer network hires a mentally impaired laborer (Matt Frewer) made into a genius by virtual reality.(n)

programme.desc: A woman (Meg Ryan) enlists a hostage negotiator (Russell Crowe) to lead mercenaries to rescue her kidnapped husband (David Morse) from South American guerrillas.(n)

programme.desc: In the future, a strange fungus has changed nearly everyone into a thoughtless, flesh-eating monster. When a scientist and a teacher find a girl who seems to be immune to the fungus, they all begin a journey to save humanity.(n)

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie (Nicholas Hoult) and a living woman (Teresa Palmer) sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.(n)

programme.title: Hackers
programme.desc: A master hacker (Jonny Lee Miller) unites teen computer freaks against an embezzling computer-security agent known as the Plague.(n)

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Because of a time warp, a supermarket worker (Bruce Campbell) finds himself fighting in medieval England with a chainsaw and a '73 Oldsmobile.(n)

programme.title: Sharky's Machine
programme.desc: An Atlanta vice-squad detective (Burt Reynolds) loves a high-class call girl (Rachel Ward) linked to politics and a mob boss (Vittorio Gassman).(n)

programme.desc: An auto racer (Emilio Estevez) crashes into dismal 2009, his body snatched by a bounty hunter (Mick Jagger) for use by a dying tycoon (Anthony Hopkins).(n)
